solution_line_template: It took him {years_learning_basics}*{research_extra_percent}=<<{years_learning_basics}*{research_extra_percent}={extra_research_time}>>{extra_research_time} years longer to do his research than it took to learn the basics
So it took him a total of {years_learning_basics}+{extra_research_time}=<<{years_learning_basics}+{extra_research_time}={total_research_time}>>{total_research_time} years to do research
His dissertation took {acclimation_period}/{half_divisor} = <<{acclimation_period}/{half_divisor}={dissertation_time}>>{dissertation_time} years to write
